group_1.textCenter: I want you to show me your proof.
The evidence that explains why witches disappeared, and why they're back now...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102200:effect_7001_attack01]●△▼◇ー!!

group_1.textRight: You won't hit anything if you just thrash around without aiming!

group_1.textLeft: [surround:1022A01][name:sprite_0:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeSmall]○■◎!?

group_1.textRight: I won't let your life be wasted.

group_1.textLeft: [surround:1005A02][name:sprite_0:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeLarge]×◎◇★!?!?

group_1.textRight: We found those witches a lot faster than I expected.

group_1.textLeft: Not bad for a day's worth of investigating.

group_1.textRight: We should ask the others how it went for them.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's meet up with them.
I found more witches than I expected during my investigation, too.

group_1.textRight: Maybe the number just went up because we were all fighting with each other.
Either way, there's still a lot more witches than @before...

group_1.textLeft: I've added up the numbers from you all.
And it shows that there's as many witches as before @the [textRed:Bloody Tragedy]. Maybe even more...

group_1.textRight: The problem is the balance between Magical Girls @and Grief Seeds.

group_1.textLeft: Even if we say one seed was good for two or three recoveries...
We're probably still going to run a little short on @them, to keep all of us going without issue.
We're going to have to manage them smartly.

group_1.textRight: Hmm, well we do kill Kyubey on sight in Futatsugi...
Maybe if we stop doing that, we'd start to see more witches?

group_1.textLeft: That means we'd be dragging more people into the @fate of Magical Girls.
The number of witches equals the number of @Magical Girls who've fallen victim to that fate.
So I don't really care for that idea much.

group_1.textRight: But I'd still say it's a good start, if witches really are coming back.

group_1.textLeft: ... Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Then I guess I can work something out with you.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.textRight: I've got an idea for you.

group_1.textLeft: Go ahead.

group_1.textRight: I'm sure you've asked other Ryuugasaki girls to join @up with you as well.
I want all of us to meet with you at once so we can discuss our terms.

group_1.textLeft: It would be good for everyone to hear everything firsthand, so there's no miscommunications later.
Having a talk in advance sounds good.
We'll accept your suggestion.
